Text: T to the R to the U-T-H

T to the R to the U-T-H 
 How did we meet? 
 Online. Unseen. 
 How did we greet? 
 A meme. An emoji 
 It felt only you saw 
 what many never see 
 You DM-ed that you 
 Believed in Me!

So even after logic 
 And all the theory 
 I switched on the camera 
 So you could be with me

I have to hide behind filters 
 So no one places me

This is where I need your help! 
 All or Nothing

What will you take? 
 Nothing or Everything? 
 What is your opinion? 
 To be a part of this or not? 
 What is it that makes you 
 proud of yourself?

Do to your heart what you say 
 In a way that others 
 Do to yours? 
 You'll never know until you try 
 Are you ready to be out of here
THINK: Age, title, membership - mean nothing to true leadership.
